Ryazani news

An exhibition of artists ' masters on 18 and 19 centuries has been opened at the Ryazan Arts Museum

28.12.2023 21:13
Today, under the heading " Shedevre Day " , we will talk about the work of the painter Nikolay Ivanov, the leading razor master of the mid-19th century.

To the end of the year, the Ryazan oblast will begin the work of the One Computing Centre

28.12.2023 20:02
The Regional ERRC will include a common database of multi-family houses, which will enhance interaction with the GIS of HCH.

A new kindergarten No. 40 has been opened in the razana cal.

28.12.2023 19:50
It provides for 10 groups, three of which are local.

Natalia Grisina described preparations for the presidential elections in Ryazan province

28.12.2023 18:25
According to Grishin, since 2018, public headquarters and public monitoring groups have been operating in Ryazan province, as in the country.

Meteo-prevention has been declared in the Ryazan region

28.12.2023 17:46
The residents are asked to limit their time on the street and to remember safety rules.

State and regional awards were awarded to Ryazan residents

28.12.2023 17:27
The head of the region noted that the awards were a sign of deep respect for creative work, the contribution to economic and social development in the field, professionalism and responsibility.

An updated sterilization unit was set up in the razana OCB

28.12.2023 16:22
The details are given by the Minsters of Ryazan province.

The residents of Ryazani complained about the state of illumination in the centre of the city.

28.12.2023 15:41
The post came up in the social media.

The Chiefs of the Ryazani Administration are Mihail Romodin

28.12.2023 15:20
In addition, there have been a number of other appointments in the city.

From 30 December, parking services will cease to operate in Ryazani

28.12.2023 14:46
The reason for the job stop is the transfer of paid parking to the property of the city.

At the Rajsk-1 station station, a memorial board was opened by Mikhail Skobelev

28.12.2023 14:22
The ceremony was attended by veterans, railways, schoolchildren, members of the public and clergy.

The gas station in Rijsk drowned in the lawn.

28.12.2023 13:56
Photographs have been published by the Ryuzengka group.

M5 Moll spoke about the new year ' s holiday regime

28.12.2023 13:39
Up to 31 December, the Trade Centre operates in normal mode, then changes are made to the schedule.

On the night of 1 January, the Ryazan region is starving.

28.12.2023 13:24
On 31 December, the region is expected to be 1 degrees by night, the temperature will be reduced to less than 16 degrees.

Two people were injured in Ryzanho's hard drive.

28.12.2023 12:45
Both men were injured, people needed medical attention.

A unique museum operates in the Rail Station in Rijsk.

28.12.2023 12:36
On 27 December, in Ryazan province, a memorial board of Russian white general M. Skobelev was opened at the railway station building of the Rajask station. It's a four-way barelef, stealing facades...

Ryazan Oncodispanser reported a schedule for a new year's holiday.

28.12.2023 12:33
Oncodispenser will not work on 31 December, 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 January.

The Palace of Children ' s Creativity takes a new year ' s vision

28.12.2023 12:06
The children meet Deed Moroz and Snegurac, have a pleasure in participating in classrooms, watching theatrical performance.

Appointed Chiefs of the two Ryazani Administration Offices

28.12.2023 11:30
Vitaly Artömov has signed orders for appointments within the new structure of the Ryazani administration, reports to the mayor ' s site.

Banking cards are used more than a million times daily in the Ryazan region

28.12.2023 10:58
In the Ryazan region, about 2.6 million paychecks were issued.

The Skopin region summarized the year ' s results

28.12.2023 10:51
Participants in the Commemorative Commemorative Event, organized at the successful Cultural House, were leaders of enterprises and organizations, representatives of the public

Marmax Girls summarized 2023 outcomes

28.12.2023 10:24
The Marmax Developer Company ' s technicians took stock of the past year, highlighting significant trends in their housing complexes and outlining future plans.

The GK Special Technician, Green Garden, described his profession.

28.12.2023 10:17
Albert Bitchkov has been a driver in Green Garden since 2022. Loaders, long-mouths, slides.

In Ryazan province, 83,000 official marriages have been concluded in 10 years

28.12.2023 09:53
The number of weddings is 1.5 times higher than the number of registered divorces during the same period.

Ryazans rehabilitated water bodies in the Herson region

28.12.2023 09:49
A team of IP ' s " Ryazani Vodokanal " , carried out work on the emergency repair of the waterways in the villages of Nonovatalyevka and Krestovka Kherson province.

On the eve of the New Year, the Tanzanian court martials will help citizens

28.12.2023 09:22
The hotline will be held on Friday, 29 December, from 10:00 to 13:00.

A man was injured in the Kasimov fire, children evacuated

28.12.2023 08:46
The fire in the 2-story apartment building was reported on 27 December at 15.22.

An explosive charge at the powder factory was handed down in Ryazan province

28.12.2023 07:58
We will recall that 17 people were killed during the bombing of the Rastar Company on 22 October 2021.

Ryazani's school will play "The Smart All" at the Penn!

28.12.2023 07:13
Will Elizabeth from Ryazani be the winner of the Intelligent Smart Show, see today, 28 December

Artem Nikitin described plans to develop the Town of Commerce.

27.12.2023 21:09
Nikitin noted that the merchant town could merge with neighbouring locations, the Youth Sad and Leso Park.
